Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2008 10:20AM kathy8429 wrote: I am pretty bummed about the whole thing.  I didn't do chemo initially because I was early stage and my onco dx score showed I had a 15% chance of reoccurance.  Of course that was if I took tamoxifin, which I couldn't tolerate.  The oncologist told me that not taking the tamox increased my risk of recurrance significantly, but sometimes you have to make choices and take chances.
